dialogueLines.line: Oh, is that the guy the woman was talking about?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: What the hell are you doing!?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Shut up. A zombie just walked up to me with its hands in the air. Of course I'm going to shoot it.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: We're not going to eat you! I'm just looking for someone!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Have you ever seen a couple of kids, a man and a woman?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: I want to eat the brains of a professional rapper boy. I just heard from a woman that you are the one who knows him.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: So, you know, if you knew where the boy was...
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: I'll say it again! What are you doing!?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: At this very moment, you've turned into a target to kill. I'm his, well, friend.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: If I'm going to kill him, I'm going to have to turn you back into a corpse first, you rotten bitch.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: Oh...oh dear...I'm sorry, but I'm not going back to being a corpse.
dialogueLines.speaker: lily
